update.name: Sagenda Calendar
update.description:
This is the lastest version of Sagenda booking calendar. = 2.1.1 = * FIXED : Compilation problem. * FIXED : When displaying calendar in adaptive mode, after a click events are displayed in the center of the screen also for mobile (not in the bottom).
= 2.1.0 = * ADDED : Now you can add a "Terms and conditions" checkbox with URL. * FIXED : A lot, really a lot.
= 2.0.4 = * FIXED : layout improvement.
= 2.0.1 = * FIXED : problem for loading events with "right to left" languages such as Arabic.
= 2.0.0 = Biggest Sagenda update ever. * ADDED : New Calendar views (day, week, month) * ADDED : New Agenda view. * ADDED : You can now display bookings in public view (optional). * TESTED : PHP 7.4.x
= 1.5.0 = * ADDED : improved support for customization edition form. * FIXED : A bug when adding another member for multiple booking and when not having customized fields. * FIXED : A bug when starting the week view with monday instead of sunday, the date displayed on the header where not updated.
= 1.4.0 = * ADDED : First support for customization edition form.
= 1.3.1 = * FIXED : An error message if PayPal module not activated even if there's not paid event.
= 1.3.0 = * ADDED : Event title (when checked "display in frontend") can be now displayed also in the calendar view. Was only in list view until today. * ADDED : Coupon code. If your customers book a paid event, they can now enter coupon code (aka : discount code). * IMPROVED : if there's a paid event and the payment module isn't activated we display an error message. * IMPROVED : registration form layout is better (again).
